trigger: Inaccessible attic, crawlspace, or work area
action_item: Notify client and request access be cleared before assessment or work. Defer all field activities until access is confirmed safe.
documentation: Photo of access barrier, client notification, post-clearance photo.
policy_text: All work areas must be accessible for inspection and installation before WX activities.

trigger: Unsafe entry or worksite conditions (loose floorboards, structural hazard, animal presence)
action_item: Defer work and notify supervisor. Do not enter unsafe areas until corrected and cleared.
documentation: Photo of unsafe condition, supervisor notification, correction record.
policy_text: Field staff must not enter unsafe work areas; all hazards must be corrected first.

trigger: Client communication or notification not completed
action_item: Contact client prior to arrival and document communication in job file. Defer field visit if unable to notify.
policy_text: Clients must be notified in advance of site visits or work activities.

trigger: Inspector unable to verify conditions due to clutter or storage
action_item: Request that area be cleared for reinspection. Document request and reinspection results.
documentation: Photo of clutter, client request log, post-clearance photo.
policy_text: Work areas must be visually inspectable; defer if conditions cannot be confirmed.

trigger: Weather or site emergency prevents safe inspection/work
action_item: Defer visit and reschedule. Document reason for delay and notify program supervisor.
documentation: Incident/weather log, supervisor notification, reschedule date.
policy_text: Site safety is paramount. Inclement weather or emergencies require postponement of work.
